content: the humpback whale i used a doubled-up piece of yarn and a tapestry needle i had the yarn poke up from inside knotted it loosely against the body of the whale and then ran the tail back into the body similar to doing a french knot but you make a standard knot instead i m sure french knots would work i m just not very good at them i just sewed eyes on using black dk weight yarn 7 of 8 please let me know if you find any errors my ravelry username is becbrittain 8 of 8
